simplesect.para: The frequency at which the CMT-8540S-SMT buzzer is to be driven. If modifying this driver for other buzzers, another frequency may be used.

memberdef.name: PWM_INSTANCE_DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: { \ BUZZER_PWM_PERIPHERAL, /* PWM peripheral */ \ (uint8_t)BUZZER_PWM_OUTPUT_CHANNEL, /* PWM channel */ \ (uint8_t)BUZZER_PWM_OUTPUT_PORT, /* PWM output port */ \ (uint8_t)BUZZER_PWM_OUTPUT_PIN, /* PWM output pin */ \ (uint8_t)BUZZER_PWM_OUTPUT_LOCATION, /* PWM output location */ \ }

memberdef.name: PWM_CFG_DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: { \ BUZZER_FREQ, /* PWM frequency */ \ BUZZER_PWM_POLARITY, /* PWM Polarity */ \ }

memberdef.name: BUZZER_INIT_DEFAULT
memberdef.initializer: { \ PWM_INSTANCE_DEFAULT, /* PWM instance */ \ PWM_CFG_DEFAULT, /* PWM config */ \ buzzer_VOL0, /* buzzer volume */ \ }

briefdescription.para: Default init struct for buzzer initialization.
Initializes all necessary pins and peripherals used for the buzzer.

parameterdescription.para: The instance of buzzer_t. See buzzer_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors. SL_STATUS_NULL_POINTER Pointer to NULL.

briefdescription.para: Deinitializes all necessary pins and peripherals used for the buzzer.

parameterdescription.para: The instance of buzzer_t. See buzzer_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors. SL_STATUS_NULL_POINTER Pointer to NULL.

briefdescription.para: Sets the buzzer volume level in percentages (range[0..100%]).

parameterdescription.para: The instance of buzzer_t. See buzzer_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

The instance of buzzer_volume_t. Buzzer sound volume.
minimum : buzzer_VOL0
maximum : buzzer_VOL100 See buzzer_volume_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors. SL_STATUS_NULL_POINTER Pointer to NULL.

briefdescription.para: Gets the buzzer volume level in percentages (range[0..100%]).

parameterdescription.para: The instance of buzzer_t. See buzzer_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

The instance of buzzer_volume_t. Buzzer sound volume.
minimum : buzzer_VOL0
maximum : buzzer_VOL100 See buzzer_volume_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors. SL_STATUS_NULL_POINTER Pointer to NULL.

briefdescription.para: Plays a sound on the buzzer.

parameterdescription.para: The instance of buzzer_t. See buzzer_t object definition for the detailed explanation.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors. SL_STATUS_NULL_POINTER Pointer to NULL. SL_STATUS_INVALID_RANGE Out of range.

briefdescription.para: Plays a melody on the buzzer.

simplesect.para: SL_STATUS_OK if there are no errors. SL_STATUS_NULL_POINTER Pointer to NULL.

sect1.title: Evaluation Quality
sect1.para: This code has been minimally tested to ensure that it builds and is suitable as a demonstration for evaluation purposes only. This code will be maintained at the sole discretion of Silicon Labs.
